name: Planet Costa Dorada Tycoon
description:
Get the exclusivity of real properties and rent them to tourists.

More than 250 properties to choose from.

You choose price, ads, workers and much other sorts of things.

This game is translated to english, spanish, french, german, dutch,italian, portuguese, polac, russian, catalan, chinese and japanese.

All the properties shown in this game are reals and can be booked at planetcostadorada.com

Planet Costa Dorada and all properties names, their descriptions and prices are trademarks of Planet Costa Dorada S.A.
